periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 7am and 1pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 71, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 22 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 46 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.
